title: Intelligent Knowledge Base and Kaizen-Integrated Training Program for Production Manager Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Non-real-time online education optimized for smartphone-based learning environments. Emphasis on project-based assessments grounded in practical work experience

learning_goals: By the end of the training, learners can apply process analysis techniques for optimizing entire production systems.
Learners can design and execute continuous improvement activities in the workplace using Kaizen methodology.
Learners can demonstrate optimal decision-making capabilities in production problem-solving scenarios through an intelligent knowledge-based system.
Learners can derive three or more improvement outcomes in real production environments through learning-practice integrated projects.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
